moxie: Boosts Attack after knocking out any Pokémon.
magic-guard: The Pokémon only takes damage from attacks.
scrappy: Enables moves to hit Ghost-type foes.
solar-power: Boosts Sp. Atk, but lowers HP in sunshine.
anger-point: Raises Attack upon taking a critical hit.
blaze: Ups FIRE moves in a pinch.
keen-eye: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering accuracy.
no-guard: Ensures the Pokémon and its foe's attacks land.
forewarn: Determines what moves the foe has.
torrent: Ups WATER moves in a pinch.
technician: Powers up the Pokémon's weaker moves.
mirror-armor: Bounces back only the stat-lowering effects that the Pokémon receives.
filter: Reduces damage from super effective attacks.
flash-fire: Powers up Fire-type moves if hit by a fire move.
swarm: Ups BUG moves in a pinch.
overgrow: Ups GRASS moves in a pinch.
hydration: Heals status problems if it is raining.
cursed-body: May disable a move used on the Pokémon.
dry-skin: Reduces HP if it is hot. Water restores HP.
competitive: Boosts the Sp. Atk stat when a stat is lowered.
multiscale: Reduces damage when HP is full.
